mailBody:
Dear Client,

I hope this message finds you well. 

I am reaching out to greet you on behalf of J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC. We appreciate your partnership and support. As a reminder, our office is located at 25 Bank Street, Canary Wharf, London, E14 5JP, United Kingdom.

Should you have any questions or require assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC  
client@jpmorgansecuritiesplc.com
